title: New: Blludd Relations – Even Steven
body:
It constantly feels like I’m playing catch-up with music at the moment.

Just as we hit our article target yesterday, this new **Bullion/Jesse Hackett** collaboration, **Blludd Relations**, dropped into my inbox. With an album out on **Bullion**’s own **DEEK** Label later this year, it’s seems we’ll be hearing a lot more from these 2. The new track, _Even Steven_, is a sedately funky grossed out jam that certainly wets the appetite of what’s to come.
